name: Keys (itch) (JohnathanLP)
description:
Created for the GBJAM 8, September 2020

Simple maze solving game, collect the four tiles (keys) from the corners, and place them on the pedestal somewhere in the maze to progress. The time limit gets shorter each time, so move quickly, and get the highest score you can!

Developed in Pygame, this is my first jam, hope you like it!
